Html:
Hello,

 

I'm using the PHPExcel in Mozilla Firefox 3.5.19 and it's working great, but today I wanted to upgrade my browser to the 11.0 release and the PHPExcel did not work. Could anybody know why?

How did it not work exactly?

I'm using Firefox Nightly 14 with no trouble and never have any browser-specific issues.

Hi,

 

I have done it. The problem was in Mozilla: I added a line in Options->Applications to read a .xls file using MS Office Excel and it works.
